Package edu.handong.csee.java.lab09

Class Salesreporter

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.handong.csee.java.lab09.Salesreporter

  • public class Salesreporter
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a class that has instance variable about salesman's data and array of Salesman. In this class, instantiate class Salesman, and includes methods that get data, compile statistics and print-out result.
    Author:
    Sua Lee

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
        This is main method. In this method, call method that get the data, calculate the average of sales and find the highest sales. And print-out all results.
        Parameters:
        args - (Don't use this parameter in this class.)

      • getData

        public void getData​()
        This is a method that gets input data and puts them into the Salesman's instance variables. In this method, declare the Salesman array 'Team' and instantiate class Salesman to mySalesman. And by using setter method, set the data of salesman.

      • calculateAverageSales

        public void calculateAverageSales​()
        This is a method that calculate the average of sales. Declare the variable 'sum' and initiate it to 0. And add the each sales of salesman in loop, divide sum to # of salesman.

      • highestSales

        public void highestSales​()
        This is a method that finds the highest sales. In loop, compare each salesman's sales back and forth.

      • printOutResults

        public void printOutResults​()
        This is a method that prints-out the results. First, print-out average sales and highest sales and print-out the data of salesman who has the highest sales. and print-out the rest salesman's data and difference between each sales and average.
